A pretty standard menu when it comes to tapas but they were done to absolute perfection.  Seriously, you can't go wrong here.  We dined at a 2-star Michelin restaurant (Enoteca) the night before?   The quality of the food here simply blew Enoteca away.  Sure, no foam, no molecular gastronomy, etc.,  but at the end of the day the ultimate question is how does it taste?  And this tasted out of this world.  Small place, make rez.  We came early (for Barcelona) at 830 and folks were waiting.  Servers tried hard to keep up and did pretty well.  Make no mistake though--you're coming here for the spectacular food, nothing more or less.
